offers.title: Self Care Matters A Revolutionary's Approach
offers.short_desc: Self Care Matters: A Revolutionary's Approach First Edition is the inaugural text written by Anana Johari Harris Parris outlining, why self-care is revolutionary and how to develop your own Self Care Plan.

offers.title: Self Care Matters A Revolutionary's Approach
offers.short_desc: A self-care revolutionary is drowning in reasons, laced with habits, coated with people and surrounded by rules that do not support them taking good care of themselves but they begin to fight and take care of themselves anyway.

businesses.name: Self Care Agency
businesses.short_desc: Anana Harris Parris - A self-care revolutionary is drowning in reasons, laced with habits, coated with people and surrounded by rules that do not support them taking good care of themselves but they begin to fight and take care of themselves anyway.It is not enough to be an activist, mother, father or leader that takes care of others, you must be a self-care revolutionary and fight to take care of yourself.
